code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{CurrentUserContext}from'../contexts/CurrentUserContext';import trash from'../images/Trashelement.svg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(_ref){let{card,onCardClick,onCardLike,onCardDelete}=_ref;function handleClick(){onCardClick(card);}const likesNumber=card.likes.length;const{currentUser}=useContext(CurrentUserContext);const isOwn=currentUser&&card.owner._id===currentUser._id;const cardDeleteButtonClassName="elements__trash ".concat(isOwn?'elements__trash':'elements__trash_hidden');const isLiked=currentUser&&card.likes.some(i=>i._id===currentUser._id);const cardLikeButtonClassName="elements__heart ".concat(isLiked?'elements__black-heart':'');const handleLikeClick=()=>{onCardLike(card);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"elements__container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"elements__image",onClick:handleClick,src:card.link,alt:card.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"elements__description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"elements__text",children:card.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"elements__trash",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:cardDeleteButtonClassName,onClick:()=>onCardDelete(card),src:trash,alt:"Basura"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"elements__like-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:cardLikeButtonClassName,onClick:handleLikeClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"elements__like",children:likesNumber})]})]})]},card._id);}export default Card;
